author: cms-sw
body:
Reverts cms-sw/cmsdist#7093

@davidlange6 , I think this causes the build errors https://github.com/cms-sw/cmsdist/pull/7092#issuecomment-873179444 . Looks like some changes are needed on cmssw side too. For now I am reverting it and will open a re-revert to test full cmssw
title: Revert "remove python2 bindings from opencv and llvm "
